backend/main.mo: Defines the actor canister with storage mixins and extensive type definitions for members, profiles, transactions, withdrawals, products, purchases, and contact forms.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-written summaries of multiple frontend files, describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Documentation explaining how to configure and register custom domains for the frontend canister, including apex and www setup steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling defining light/dark theme variables and component base styles using OKLCH colors.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting canonical domain metadata, Open Graph tags, favicon, and a pre-load redirect script to the canonical domain.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Allowlist file specifying the frontend’s permitted IC gateway domains for apex and www hostnames.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication state, profile checks, routing, UI layout, and role-protected navigation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar rendering role-aware tabs and handling authenticated vs unauthenticated navigation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a styled footer with marketing text, contact info, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the main navigation header with authentication handling, role-based links, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/KomisiCalculator: Provides an interactive incentive calculator based on selected package pricing and predefined commission categories.
frontend/src/components/MemberDetailModa: Shows a detailed modal with member info, transactions, commissions, and a network tree for downline visualization.
frontend/src/components/NetworkTreeVisua: Draws a hierarchical family tree on a canvas to visualize user network levels and relationships.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingSteppe: Displays a step-by-step onboarding guide with progress indicators and navigation triggers.
frontend/src/components/PreWhatsAppConta: Modal form that collects customer info, fetches product data, detects geolocation with retry, and submits data before opening WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailMod: Displays detailed product info including pricing, commission, and styled feature sections inside a modal.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Multi-step profile setup modal with address auto-fill, role-based behavior, and submission via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseModal.ts: Empty placeholder file for a purchase modal component.
frontend/src/components/RouteGuard.tsx: Guards routes by checking authentication and user role, showing loading or access-denied states when necessary.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawalReques: Handles withdrawal requests, validates input, triggers backend mutation, and opens WhatsApp with pre-filled message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity change and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login flow, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboardingSteps.ts: Generates onboarding steps based on user authentication, role, registration, profile completeness, and verification, with optional navigation actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for calling backend actor methods to manage profiles, roles, admin checks, and member data with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and defines light/dark theme variables with a neon-style palette and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/addressData.ts: Provides mocked Indonesian address data including countries, provinces, cities, and postal code structure.
frontend/src/lib/productCatalog.ts: Maps product names to UI metadata such as icons and gradient colors, with a helper to fetch defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section and feature highlights, handling login and navigation to join or dashboard based on user state.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin interface for managing members, products, withdrawals, and viewing leaderboards with multiple tabs and modals.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorPage.tsx: Simple page rendering the KomisiCalculator component for commission estimation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Member dashboard showing profile, transactions, family tree, withdrawals, and onboarding with login handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Public homepage with hero section, product listing, onboarding steps, product bootstrap logic, and login-to-join flow.
frontend/src/pages/JoinPage.tsx: User registration page handling Internet Identity login, form submission, and redirects if already registered.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkPage.tsx: React page that authenticates the user, loads their family tree, shows downline stats, and renders a network visualization with Tailwind-styled UI states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from URL/hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and theme settings for the app’s neon-styled UI.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s version, architecture, known issues, and functional scope for the MyRepublic Network Hub dApp.
